data.meanings: to fall steep as a bird to its prey, rev, perish, pull down, destroy, disappear, yearn, fancy, beguile, infatuate, be blown, inspire with low passion.
data.sentence: The word هَوَى comes from the root ه و ي and is associated with the meanings: to fall steep as a bird to its prey, rev, perish, pull down, destroy, disappear, yearn, fancy, beguile, infatuate, be blown, inspire with low passion.
The word وَالنَّجْمِ comes from the root ن ج م and is associated with the meanings: to appear/rise/begin, accomplish, ensue, proceed.
